ygData.subject: Re: A good place
ygData.msgSnippet: well the reason I said that came from personal experiance.. I died about 9 times in one day in unrest and I was lvl 19. So I kinda hate the place and didn t
ygData.messageBody:
well the reason I said that came from personal experiance.. I died about 9
times in one day in unrest and I was lvl 19. So I kinda hate the place and
didn't want him to come and flame me 'cause I suggest him to go there :) but
if you have a good group you can try there.

Levo (lvl 30... darn I can't lvl no more)
----- Original Message -----
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 7:29 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] A good place


> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- LevonQeri <baghramian@...> wrote:
> > I don't suggest you to go to unrest until you're 21
> > or 22.
>
> You're kidding?
>
> Unrest is *great* for levels as low as 13th; yard
> trash is specifically there for the lower levels.
> Yard Trash can take you to about 16-17, where you can
> start pulling from the first floor (ghouls, dark boned
> skeletons, dry boned skeletons, lurking mummies).
> Always in a full group, of course.
>
> ===
> :D
> Dave's World
> -No matter where you go, there you are-
> "People will believe a lie either because they want to
> believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
> First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
